snippet: Hiroki Kuroda, 38, recently sought advice about career longevity from the Yankees spring training instructor David Wells, who pitched until he was 44.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Hiroki Kuroda, who at 38 years old is entering what could be his final Major League Baseball season, welcomes advice about career longevity from Yankees spring training instructor David Wells, who pitched until he was 44 years old.
lead_paragraph: Hiroki Kuroda, 38, recently sought advice about career longevity from the Yankees spring training instructor David Wells, who pitched until he was 44.

headline.seo: As Kuroda Enters What Could Be His Final Season, Wells Is an Unlikely Guide
headline.main: As Kuroda Enters What Could Be His Final Season, Wells Is an Unlikely Guide
headline.print_headline: As Kuroda Enters What Could Be His Final Season, Wells Is an Unlikely Guide
